Jogo miuda
 A poula do meu Ruin vai pro crl em dois segundos ,só tem swf pau no cu neste jogo ou tem killer usando a merda de mori . Muito frustante não recomendo jogar este pedaço de bosta , melhor jogar Friv do que este lixo  caso alguém com demecia vá comprar este jogo duas dica:
1 Caso vá jogar de killer para sempre ganhar use mori e noed junto , assim você sempre ira ganhar , a não ser que você seja um puta de um jogador lixo ou possui retardado mental 
2 Caso vá jogar de survivor uma dica sempre esta com amigos que de preferencia saibam jogar , caso não tenha mantenha-se focado em apenas fazer gerador e deixar seus amigos morrer no gancho ou no chão mesmo , caso esteja sendo perseguido gastes todos os paus (barricada) na sua frente , e ultima dica caso o killer tenha mori use ALT F4
good game

Dead by Daylight испытала за 2 часа игры все мои нервы. Как и наитупейшие тиммейты, так и убийцы, которые дальше 3 метров от крюка не отойдут, что портит всё впечатление от игры и не доставляет удовольствия. Лишь за прекрасную задумку и среднюю реализацию ставлю положительный отзыв. Может быть, как наиграю больше, дополню обзор. Сейчас рекомендую брать к покупке.

Dead by Daylight

- Об этой игре рассказать можно мало плохого но много хорошего.

- Минусы этой игры: Многие качают сохранение и у них большое приимущество чем у других, читеры, баги.

- Плюсы этой игры: Можно потрятить время, страх, и многое другое..

- Рекомендую повысить оптимизацию и улучшить Анти-Чит, тогда игра будет идеальной 

- Добавляйтесь в друзья буду очень рад :3

Not a perfect game. It has balance issues on both survivor and killer sides, but it has a lot of draw with its many licensed killers, survivors and maps. Their original characters are cool too. It emulates the fantasy of horror survival well enough with a lot of variety on both sides, and I think it's worth playing.

Update: July 17, 2019, what I said still stands. I am playing it now more than ever and the playerbase is the biggest its ever been!

the game was a good game,  I got my money worth out of it. but its finally gotten to the point that I can no longer look passed the glaring bugs in the game. these bugs and with how  greedy the games developers have become has really pushed the quality of the game down to a point I just cant recommend the game.  this will not be changing any time soon. my Suggestion would be   check out Gold Express instead. https://dawnstudio.itch.io/goldexpress they was inspired by this game and others like it. but I am 100% positive they will offer a far better experience over what Dead by Daylight has become. just checked out the newest mid chapter patch, seems even more bugs and broken mechanics added into the game,  they added in a battle pass system  70% of the games community did not want. I quickly  uninstalled the game again after a few hours played but this time I wont be coming back they have gone beyond fixing  the game, they have clearly showed they only care about the $$$$ and have forgotten  that best way to make money is to offer a good product. but they have zero interest in offering a good product.

Despues de jugar 40 horas me decidi a realizar la reseña.
Es survival horror donde hay 4 supervivientes (que deberan reparar generadores) y 1 asesino en contra (que debera matarlos). Es una mecanica basica pero bastante innovadora que lo vuelve bastante fresco.
PROS:
-El tiempo para encontrar partida es minimo (regularmente de menos de 1 minuto).
-Con cada actualizacion balancean habilidades, asesinos, etc, lo que permite un balance bastante bueno al juego.
-Una tematica fresca que da para muchas horas sin aburrirte.
-Una comunidad bastante buena.
-Gran variedad de asesinos, supervivientes, habilidades, etc que se añaden medianamente cada pocos periodos de tiempos.
CONTRAS:
-El emparejamiento, es malo siendo un rango muy bajo te puede emparejar con rangos altos a lo que se vuelve bastante injusto.
-El que el asesino hoste la partida. Lo considero malo porque normalmente el ping es de 300 ms lo que vuelve a veces molesto jugar.
-Su optimizacion es bastante mala, tengo un i7, una placa de video de 2gb, una ram de 16 gb y me agarra tirones de fps jugandolo en alto (y eso que los graficos no son WOW).
Le doy 8/10 porque me parece muy buen juego y la verdad que da para muchas horas pero tiene algunos errores tecnicos que deberian ir solucionando con el tiempo...

All I'm going to say is that I've never screamed in fear so loudly.

But I highly recommend this game, especially to anyone looking for an awesome horror game.

Muy buen juego la verdad. Existen alguno que otro bug pero pasan de percibido... Esta lleno de cancer como en todo juego online, particularmente existen asesinos que se te pegan a 3 cm de la cara apenas te cuelgan y otros que no, pero eso no es todo, los supervivientes tambien son toxicos, antes de siquiera con asesino golpear a 1 me hacen 3 motores, pero COMO ES POSIBLE RICHARD! la que lo pario, jueguen bien, es hacer puntos no rushear, sino yo te campeo y tuneleo como dicen todas las partidas, cada ves que me rushees te voy a tunelear y campear. No porque sea toxico sino porque vos sos un afrechudo que en 4 minutos me reparas los 5  motores, escondiendote como una rata y no haciendo nada mas que reparar y reparar. Aún patruyando motores, no miento, en una partida me tocaron los 4 con tiempo prestado me rushearon, quise campear y ni eso porque no se puede porque quieren porque el asesino no tiene tantas ventajas como dicen que tiene. Ponganse de acuerdo para otras cosas no para cagarla asi loco, no se puede jugar bien de asesino si rusheas, si cuelgan a tu amigo y yo obviamente no estoy cerca, no sigas reparando, si me ves llegar tampoco, corre, escondete, sabotea, busca el totem de maleficio, comprale tiempo a tus compañeros para que reparen o se curen. Y no es valido que en absolutamente todas las partida pongas, gg camper aunque es obvio que no campee, no lo hagas, no seas toxico por favor. El juego es bueno, la comunidad mas o menos.
esse jogo e muito bom so com uns bugs que os criadores tem que consertar mas tirando isso esse jogo perfeito e eu recomendo

I really wanted to get into this game, I honestly did, but the game is very rigged towards Survivors, especially ones that work together more often than not to game the system. Intentionally blocking hooks, pallet looping, and harassment of the killer is very biased, and the way to get to the top of the ranks seems filled with this bunch of toxic people that will do whatever it takes to win a damn game. Let's not forget the cheeky bunch that all pile up near a gate and screw around until you decide to hit one of them, to which they all escape because exploiting limitations."We only do it because it's the only way to have fun anymore. The game is rigged towards the killer." THAT'S THE POINT OF THE GAME. It's much better to outsmart the killer than to be a cheap jerk. You ever seen a horror movie that has the victims actively doing everything they can to be seen and even troll the damn killer? Damn shame, becuase this game can sometimes be fun without the inclusion of these toxic players. There's no way I'm stooping to their level to climb the ranks. If you have to resort to such unscrupulous tactics to have fun, then is it really a game that you should be playing? A niche community that has the audacity to compete in terms of unfriendly behaviour the likes of CS:GO and LoL? Now that's a better joke than whatever toxics say in their defense.

Edit: Flashlihghts still suck massive. Why I can't close my eyes as the killer is beyond me. Got guys standing point blank in front of me while I'm picking their teammate up, and PEW! What a great game.

Un juego muy recomendable. Pero tener en cuenta una cosa. Esta lleno de bug, aunque los solucionan se crean unos nuevos. Os aconsejo pillarlo, pero solo en rebajas de steam cuando este a 10eur, a más de esto es demasiado caro.
